Interface Action

All Superinterfaces:
Serializable
All Known Implementing Classes:
ChooseBatteryAction, ChoosePropulsorAction, ChooseTileAction, ChooseTileFromBufferAction, CloseFaceUpTilesAction, CompareCrewAction, CompareFirePowerAction, CreateGameAction, DrawFaceDownAction, EndBuildingAction, EpidemicAction, FixShipAction, GetNextAdventureCardAction, GetRewardsAction, HandleBoxesAction, InitAction, JoinGameAction, LoadCrewAction, PickPileAction, PlaceAction, PlaceInBufferAction, PlanetsAction, PlayerAction, RemoveCrewAction, RetireAction, ReturnPileAction, ReturnTileAction, RollDiceAction, RotateAction, SetNicknameAction, ShowFaceUpAction, StardustAction, StartTimerAction, StopBuildingAction
public interface Action extends Serializable

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    boolean
    checkAction(Player player)
    Checks whether the given player can perform the action.
    void
    dispatchTo(GamesController controller)
    Dispatches the action to the specified GamesController for processing.
    void
    execute(Player player)
    Executes the action for the specified player.
    String
    getPlayerNickname()
    Retrieves the nickname of the player associated with the action.

  • Method Details

    • execute

      void execute(Player player) throws InvalidStateException
      Executes the action for the specified player. (Command pattern's execute)
      Parameters:
      player - the player for which the action is executed.
      Throws:
      InvalidStateException - if the action cannot be executed due to an invalid state.

    • checkAction

      boolean checkAction(Player player) throws InvalidActionException
      Checks whether the given player can perform the action.
      Parameters:
      player - the player attempting to perform the action.
      Returns:
      true if the action is valid for the player;
      Throws:
      InvalidActionException - if the action cannot be performed

    • getPlayerNickname

      String getPlayerNickname()
      Retrieves the nickname of the player associated with the action.
      Returns:
      the player's nickname as a string

    • dispatchTo

      void dispatchTo(GamesController controller) throws InvalidActionException, InvalidStateException
      Dispatches the action to the specified GamesController for processing.
      Parameters:
      controller - the GamesController handling the action dispatch.
      Throws:
      InvalidActionException
      InvalidStateException
